translations: n.清唱剧，神剧（oratorio 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Oratorios were still composed during this era as well, as were secular cantatas.
sentences.translation: 神曲仍然组成，在这个时代，以及作为人的世俗清唱剧。

sentences.sentence: Here he may have composed oratorios, but no evidence of this Roman repertoire survives.
sentences.translation: 在这里，他可能构成圣乐，但没有证据表明这个罗马剧目生存。

sentences.sentence: He produced more than 30 operas and oratorios, numerous cantatas and instrumental works.
sentences.translation: 他制作超过30歌剧和神剧，清唱剧和器乐众多作品。
